title: Civil unrest triggers curfew in Bogota, Colombia
snippet: Authorities declare 24-hour curfew following escalated protests near government district. Dell employees advised to shelter in place. Airport access restricted.

title: Typhoon Melissa strengthens; Landfall expected in Taiwan
snippet: Super Typhoon approaching Hsinchu Science Park. Manufacturing operations likely to halt for 48 hours. Logistics delays confirmed.

title: Power grid instability reported in Texas following storm
snippet: Winter storm causes rolling blackouts across Austin/Round Rock area. Dell HQ running on backup power. IT systems stable.
